title: Axi Delivers Unbeatably Tight Spreads on Key Markets Including Gold, Crypto, and Forex
description: SYDNEY, April 24, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) — Axi, a leading global online trading broker, is proud to announce its latest commitment to industry-leading pricing with some of the most competitive spreads in the market. title: Ethereums Unstoppable Rise in Crypto Cosmos
description: Ethereum keeps its superior position in the world of cryptocurrencies as it is still the second-largest after Bitcoin, with a market cap of $210.28 billion, the price responding to the modest 2.94% start of the day by reaching $1,742.
